> 
> This set of questions are also for the mods, based on the idea proposed by [Flymetothemun](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/17700-Flymetothemun). I'm just asking these mainly out of curiosity...
> 1. Do you play with mods? If so, what is your favorite mod?
> 
> 2. Which mode do you prefer to play KSP in? Why (if you don't mind sharing)?
> 
> 3. Least favorite stock part?

1. I don't really use mods, but I like B9. Yes, it clutters the parts menu up a bit but I love the aesthetic.

2. I prefer Sandbox. The start of career mode is boring because it isn't ambitious.

3. The aerodynamic-y science-y nose cone thingy. Just hate it.

Have you ever made a thread but not want to subscribe to it?

> 
> Have you ever made a thread but not want to subscribe to it?

No. I even subscribe to threads I reply to, plus other ones I'm interested in.

Of course, you can always unsubscribe from threads in your control panel.
I'm one of those weirdoes that doesn't really use the Subscribe option much at all. I typically only use it for threads I plan on regularly following, for either moderation or for personal reasons.

> 
> I'm one of those weirdoes that doesn't really use the Subscribe option much at all. I typically only use it for threads I plan on regularly following, for either moderation or for personal reasons.

I literally don't use it at all, at least, not on purpose. Those threads that do get auto-subscribed to just sit in the dusty corner of my profile page, the tab never to be looked at.

> 
> I'm one of those weirdoes that doesn't really use the Subscribe option much at all. I typically only use it for threads I plan on regularly following, for either moderation or for personal reasons.

Interesting, I remember I put up a poll about how people use subscriptions, and a surprising number don't use it at all.

> 
> Interesting, I remember I put up a poll about how people use subscriptions, and a surprising number don't use it at all.

I love it, i have folders for my posts I want to follow and ones for interesting craft and ideas.. 

I'm on Auto subscribe and I go thur every few days of my non folded ones, check to make sure I haven't missed any posts I want to follow up and clear out most of the rest, its really quite good.

A question, how do you disable Auto-Subscribing and remove the current subscribed threads?

Thanks!

> 
> A question, how do you disable Auto-Subscribing and remove the current subscribed threads?
> Thanks!

Able to be turned off under "General Settings". Removing current subscribed threads may be done under "SkrubSkriptions" tab - 'empty current folder'.

> 
> A question, how do you disable Auto-Subscribing and remove the current subscribed threads?
> Thanks!

Autosubscribe settings are in Settings > General Settings (On left side) > Default Thread Subscription Mode. Set it to "Do Not Subscribe" and the feature is turned off.

Manage your subscriptions through Settings > My Subscriptions (also on the left). Tag the ones you want removed on the right hand side and choose "Delete Subscription" from the drop down menu at bottom right.

Edit: Ninja'd, but I was more thorough and didn't call anyone a skrub.
